title: 162 - John MacArthur's Statement on Social Justice is a Flaming Hot Mess
description:
Our friend Skye joins us to discuss the Statement on Social Justice and the Gospel. Needless to say, we have a few disagreements. 

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
